name: GET_suppression-bounces-email
description: **This endpoint allows you to retrieve a specific bounce by email address.**

on-behalf-of.default: The subuser's username. This header generates the API call as if the subuser account was making the call.

$ul: **created**: The unix timestamp for when the bounce record was created at SendGrid.
**email**: The email address that was added to the bounce list.
**reason**: The reason for the bounce. This typically will be a bounce code, an enhanced code, and a description.
